meanings.sent1: I used a special spray to destain the carpet.
meanings.sent2: She carefully destains the tablecloth before the party.
meanings.sent3: The destaining process turned into a fun game of cleaning.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to destain the old memories from her mind was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The powerful detergent quickly destains even the toughest stains.

meanings.definition: The act of removing stains from something.
meanings.sent1: Destaining requires patience and the right tools.
meanings.sent2: The destaining of the clothes was a success.
meanings.sent3: The destaining of the walls became a community event.
meanings.sent4: In her hands, destaining became an art form.
meanings.sent5: The destaining of the old book revealed hidden beauty underneath.
